verbs.description: [V: snap] has seen more than 13 billion wiped out from its market value since kylie jenner tweeted her displeasure with its redesign snap shares fell more than 7 tuesday and have plunged about 63 since kylie jenner tweeted her displeasure with the snapchat app redesign the stock ceo twitter director snap spiegel jenner was 13 billion kylie jenner evan spiegel with anthony diclemente matthew unterman
